name: Puf and Sparks of the Will
name_original: Puf and Sparks of the Will
description:
Puf and Sparks of the Will

Adventure of light-like creature in the realm of shadows where dark things lay asleep.

Open portals by catching sparks of the will in order to move trough the levels.

Avoid deadly traps like spikes, blades and cannons, outsmart dark creatures, obtain power and face the boss.

Controls:

          [A] - Move Right

          [D] - Move Left

          [SPACE] - Jump

          [W] - Shoot (If boss is on the screen)

Test out your skills by choosing different difficulty - GIF:
